LightningOutApp.name: LightningOutApp
LightningOutApp.description: Represents a Lightning Out 2.0 application. With a Lightning Out 2.0 app, you can embed Lightning web components (LWC) into external applications.

ApplicationName.description: The name of the Lightning Out 2.0 app.

DeveloperName.description: The unique API name of the Lightning Out 2.0 app.

IsEnabled.description: Indicates whether the Lightning Out 2.0 app is enabled (true) or disabled (false). The default value is false. If the app is disabled, then user authentication fails and the embedded components don’t load in the external app.

MasterLabel.description: ​A user-friendly name for the LightningOutApp, which is defined when the LightningOutApp is created.
